title: 105_s280
content: Time for Schools Act of 1997 - Amends the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 to allow employees covered by such Act to take up to 24 hours, during any 12-month period, of school involvement leave to participate in: (1) an activity of their child's school. Or (2) literacy training under a family literacy program. Amends Federal civil service law to apply the same school involvement leave allowance to Federal employees.
